characters.name: Cloud
characters.biography: Former First Class SOLDIER. After defecting from Shinra, Cloud began work as a mercenary for hire in Midgar. With his trusty broadsword in hand, he always gets the job done.

characters.name: Tifa
characters.biography: A member of the anti-Shinra militant group Avalanche. Tifa manages Seventh Heaven, a bar located in the Sector 7 slums. A student of Zangan-style martial arts, she can clobber opponents with her fleet-footed combat techniques.

characters.name: Aeris
characters.biography: She wields a rod, but her strength lies in her magic use.

characters.name: Barret
characters.biography: A faction leader of the anti-Shinra militant group Avalanche. Barret is filled with a burning hatred for Shinra, a company he claims is destroying the planet. His right arm has been modified into a firearm, allowing him to attack his enemies at long range.

characters.name: Red XIII
characters.biography: A red lion or wolf-like beast of a unique species, Red XIII is the only quadrupedal playable character in the main Final Fantasy series so far.

characters.name: Cid
characters.biography: Cid is a tough talking, warm-hearted old pilot who hasn't forgotten his dreams...

characters.name: Vincent
characters.biography: A mystical man, stern and upright while at the same time dark and mysterious...

characters.name: Yuffie
characters.biography: Cunning and sly, she may look like a common thief, but Yuffie is a very skilled and powerful ninja...

characters.name: Sephiroth
characters.biography: There was one SOLDIER named Sephiroth, who was better than the rest, but when he found out about the terrible experiments that made him, he began to hate Shinra. And then, over time, he began to hate everything.

items.name: Potion
items.Descriptiom: Heal a party member with this concoction.

items.name: Elixer
items.biography: Complete recovery of health and magic strength.

items.name: Buster Sword
items.biography: Heavy and deadly blade for warriors.

items.name: Phoenix Down
items.biography: Bring a party member back to life.

items.name: Materia
items.biography: Magic orbs that grant you abilities.
